description: This file defines a Python module that sets up an AI agent called 'Llama Tutor' with integrated tools for web search, analysis, and file management. It includes configuration for paths, environment variables, and a function to instantiate the agent with tailored instructions and tools based on parameters like education level.

methods.name: tutor_agent
methods.description: Creates and configures an AI agent called 'Llama Tutor' with tools for web search, analysis, and file saving, tailored to a specified education level and other parameters.
